doc:
Christina Hendricks https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christina_Hendricks 0 Christina Rene Hendricks (born May 3, 1975) is an American actress and model. She is best known for her starring role as Joan Holloway on the AMC period drama series Mad Men (2007–2015) and as Beth Boland in the NBC crime drama series Good Girls (2018–present). Hendricks has also appeared as Saffron in the Fox space western series Firefly (2002–03), Celine/"Chair" in the Comedy Central period sitcom Another Period (2015–16), and as Trudy in the SundanceTV drama series Hap and Leonard (2016). Her notable film credits include Drive (2011), God's Pocket (2014), Lost River (2014), The Neon Demon (2016), Fist Fight (2017), and The Strangers: Prey at Night (2018). A poll of female readers taken by Esquire magazine named Hendricks "the sexiest woman in the world". In 2010, she was voted Best Looking Woman in America by Esquire magazine. Christina_Rene_Hendricks ( born May_3_,_1975 ) is an_American_actress_and_model . She is_best_known for her_starring_role as Joan_Holloway on the_AMC_period_drama_series_Mad_Men_(_2007 – 2015_) and as Beth_Boland in the_NBC_crime_drama_series_Good_Girls ( 2018 – present_) . Hendricks has_also_appeared as Saffron in the_Fox_space_western_series_Firefly_(_2002 – 03_) , Celine / " Chair " in the_Comedy_Central_period_sitcom Another_Period_(_2015 – 16_) , and as Trudy in the_SundanceTV_drama_series_Hap and Leonard_(_2016_) . Her_notable_film_credits include Drive_(_2011_) , God 's_Pocket_(_2014_)_,_Lost_River_(_2014_) , The_Neon_Demon_(_2016_)_,_Fist_Fight_(_2017_) , and The_Strangers : Prey at Night_(_2018_) . A_poll of female_readers taken by Esquire_magazine named Hendricks " the_sexiest_woman in the_world_" . In 2010 , she was_voted_Best_Looking Woman in America by Esquire_magazine .
